item.title: 1,000,000 Miles of Metro Ethernet Fiber And Growing
item.description:
Don’t assume Metro Ethernet is a small, insignificant service. XO Communications alone has a vast network of metro fiber, connecting thousands of buildings. And that’s just one provider, not even counting Ethernet over Copper options. Metro Ethernet and its long-distance counterpart, Carrier Ethernet, are the future of telecommunications. The world is shifting from traditional circuit-based communication to packet-based IP networks. While your current internet might be a T1 line, your data likely transitions to an IP-based backbone at your provider’s location...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/1-000-000-miles-of-metro-ethernet-fiber-and-growing/
